TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ElcFolderType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates the folders that accept messaging records management (MRM) policies. The enumeration is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType All = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to all folders that do not have a policy specified. The All field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Calendar = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Calendar folder. The Calendar field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Contacts = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Contacts folder. The Contacts field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType ConversationHistory = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the default Conversation History folder. This folder is used to archive IM Conferencing service conversations. The ConversationHistory field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType DeletedItems = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Deleted Items folder. The DeletedItems field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Drafts = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Drafts folder. The Drafts field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Inbox = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Inbox folder. The Inbox field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Journal = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Journal folder. The Journal field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType JunkEmail = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Junk mail folder. The JunkEmail field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType ManagedCustomFolder = int32(13)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Managed Custom folders. The ManagedCustomFolder field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType NonIpmRoot = int32(19)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the non-interpersonal messaging subtree folder. The NonIpmRoot field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Notes = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The retention policy applies to the Notes folder. The Notes field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ElcFolderType Outbox = int32(9)
